translations: [地质] 造山的；造山运动的

sentences.sentence: Formation of the basin is closely relative to the development of the South Dabashan-Dahongshan Orogenic Belt.
sentences.translation: 盆地的形成与南大巴山—大洪山造山带的发育密切相关。

sentences.sentence: Dynamic sedimentology of orogenic belts is an important aspect for the research on continental dynamics and geology of orogenic belts.
sentences.translation: 造山带动力沉积学是造山带地质学和大陆动力学研究的重要方面。

sentences.sentence: There was an orogenic belt called the Cathaysian continental marginal orogenic belt in late Mesozoic along the present northern margin of the South China Sea.
sentences.translation: 南海北部陆缘在中生代晚期曾形成宏伟的华夏陆缘造山带。
